title: Welcome to EDUC 315
text:
The pages on this site outline the technical components of EDUC 315: Principles of Teaching Math and Science in Urban Classrooms II at Howard University, taught by Professor Nathan Alexander. This site will serve as a companion to our Canvas site and support you with questions relevant to teaching STEM in grades 4-6 and your development of a pedagogical praxis for your future classroom.
